content.p: The Faculty of Social Sciences is part of a globally engaged university that is a pioneer in international education. As a member of the UK's prestigious Russell Group and the Universitas 21 global network, we are a university without borders. Our teaching spans three campuses in the UK, Malaysia and China and over 150 countries are currently represented by those who study and work with us. We have developed links with leading institutions across the globe, including teaching partnerships with over 50 universities. The Faculty of Social Sciences is a large and diverse faculty and we offer a range of courses that will enhance your global career potential. Accredited by the British Council, we provide a wide range of courses to improve your English. Nottingham has 200 partners in 40 different countries spanning six different continents across four different exchange programmes. We aim to deliver solutions to global research challenges and over half of our research outputs involve an international collaboration. lz-foss-core-ops@exmail.nottingham.ac.uk Current student enquiries
